tika-abh07t6:3: 2. Akusalasaṅgaho missakasaṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho ceti samuccayasaṅgaho catubbidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t6:5: 3. Kathaṃ? Akusalasaṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t6:6: 4. Cattāro oghā – kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho.
tika-abh07t6:7: 5. Cattāro yogā – kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo.
tika-abh07t6:8: 6. Cattāro ganthā – abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo kāyagantho, sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
tika-abh07t6:9: 7. Cattāro upādānā – kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:10: 8. Cha nīvaraṇāni – kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:11: 9. Satta anusayā – kāmarāgānusayo bhavarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo avijjānusayo.
tika-abh07t6:12: 10. Dasa saṃyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ rūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ arūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ uddhaccasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ suttante.
tika-abh07t6:13: 11. Aparānipi dasa saṃyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ issāsaṃyojanaṃ macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ abhidhamme (vibha. 969).
tika-abh07t6:14: 12. Dasa kilesā – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:15: 13. Āsavādīsu panettha kāmabhavanāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā, sīlabbataparāmāso idaṃsaccābhiniveso attavādupādo ca tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhigatameva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t6:23: 15.Missakasaṅgahe cha hetū – lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho.
tika-abh07t6:24: 16. Satta jhānaṅgāni – vitakko vicāro pīti ekaggatā somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhā.
tika-abh07t6:25: 17. Dvādasa maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t6:26: 18. Bāvīsatindriyāni – cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:27: 19. Nava balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:28: 20. Cattāro adhipatī – chandādhipati vīriyādhipati cittādhipati vīmaṃsādhipati.
tika-abh07t6:29: 21. Cattāro āhārā – kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:34: 26. Pañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni, avīriyesu balāni, ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t6:35: 27. Tathā vicikicchācitte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t6:37: 29. Cha hetū pañca jhānaṅgā, maggaṅgā nava vatthuto.
tika-abh07t6:42: 30.Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgahe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:43: 31. Cattāro sammappadhānā uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāya vāyāmo, anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ anuppādāya vāyāmo, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādāya vāyāmo, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vāyāmo.
tika-abh07t6:44: 32. Cattāro iddhipādā – chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṃsiddhipādo.
tika-abh07t6:45: 33. Pañcindriyāni – saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:46: 34. Pañca balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:47: 35. Satta bojjhaṅgā – satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo samādhisambojjhaṅgo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
tika-abh07t6:48: 36. Aṭṭha maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t6:49: 37. Ettha pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti sammāsati ekāva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t6:61: 41. Sabbe lokuttare honti, na vā saṅkappapītiyo.
tika-abh07t6:64: 42.Sabbasaṅgahe pañcakkhandhā – rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
tika-abh07t6:65: 43. Pañcupādānakkhandhā – rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
tika-abh07t6:66: 44. Dvādasāyatanāni – cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:67: 45. Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu dhammadhātu manoviññāṇadhātu.
tika-abh07t6:68: 46. Cattāri ariyasaccāni – dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ.
tika-abh07t6:69: 47. Ettha pana cetasikasukhumarūpanibbānavasena ekūnasattati dhammā dhammāyatanadhammadhātūti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t6:77: 52. Dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, taṇhā samudayo bhave.
tika-abh07t6:78: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato.
